<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1118046_partne_0.CommentSyncUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>CommentSyncUtil</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var CommentSyncUtil = Class.create();
CommentSyncUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    /**
     * Synchronizes comments from a source record to a target record.
     * @param {GlideRecord} sourceRecord - The record where the comment was just added.
     * @param {GlideRecord} targetRecord - The record to which the comment should be copied.
     */
    syncComments: function(sourceRecord, targetRecord) {
        if (!sourceRecord || !targetRecord) {
            gs.warn("CommentSyncUtil: Source or target record is invalid.");
            return;
        }

        // Get the most recent journal entry (the comment just added)
        var latestComment = sourceRecord.comments.getJournalEntry(1);

        // Update the target record's comments with the new entry
        targetRecord.comments = latestComment;
        targetRecord.update();
    },

    type: 'CommentSyncUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-09 16:01:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>d13c60c993db2650d5ec31697bba104a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CommentSyncUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Partner Onboarding" source="x_1118046_partne_0">2ac1af2e931ea290d5ec31697bba10f0</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Partner Onboarding">2ac1af2e931ea290d5ec31697bba10f0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d13c60c993db2650d5ec31697bba104a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-09 16:01:55</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
